ygData.subject: SV: [archive-crawler] Embed Heritrix 1.14.4.
ygData.msgSnippet: Heritrix comes with its own (patched) HTTPClient implementation as far as I remember. So running inside a tomcat you might have conflicting libs ? best Bjarne
